entry.title: 'Treeverse' Studio Endless Clouds Picks Immutable zkEVM for Its NFT Games
entry.summary: Loopify’s studio will launch Treeverse and Capsule Heroes on Immutable’s zkEVM blockchain.

entry.title: Polymer Aims to Unify Ethereum Ecosystem With 'Interoperability Hub'
entry.summary: Polymer, an Ethereum layer 2 that provides interoperability as a service, has raised a $23 million Series A from Coinbase Ventures, Placeholder, and more.

entry.title: Agoria's 'Le Code d’Orsay': Inside the Musée d’Orsay’s First NFT Exhibition
entry.summary: Le Code d’Orsay, a new project from the artist and DJ Agoria, will premiere at the Orsay next month. Here's a first look.

entry.title: Preview of Agoria's 'Le Code d’Orsay'
entry.summary: A first look at "Sigma Lumina," a sculpture by artist and musician Agoria in collaboration with Johan Lescure. It features in "Le Code d’Orsay," the first NFT exhibition at the Musée d’Orsay.

entry.title: Bitcoin Slides Below $39,000 as Selloff Continues
entry.summary: Bitcoin fell below $39,000 early Tuesday morning as post-ETF approval selloffs continued to strain markets.

entry.title: Crypto Casino Rollbit Sponsors FaZe Clan in Multi-Million-Dollar Esports Deal
entry.summary: Rollbit will sponsor FaZe Clan’s top-ranked Counter-Strike 2 esports team, albeit only outside of North America.

entry.title: SEC: Fake Bitcoin ETF Announcement Caused by SIM Swap Attack
entry.summary: Two-factor authentiation on the SEC's Twitter account had been disabled since July 2023, the regulator revealed.

entry.title: Resurrecting Dead Loved Ones with AI Is Already a Thing
entry.summary: A documentary premiering at Sundance Film Festival follows the sometimes heartwarming, sometimes harrowing world of ”thanabots.”

entry.title: ‘Pokémon With Guns’: Why Gamers Can’t Stop Talking About Palworld
entry.summary: Palworld is gaming’s hottest new thing, with huge sales and sizable controversy to match for the Pokémon-esque indie game. Here’s why.

entry.title: Bitcoin Ordinals 'Quantum Cat' Sells for Over $250K at Sotheby's
entry.summary: The “Genesis Cat” Bitcoin art by FAR fetched 6.31 BTC at Sotheby's, with the wider Ordinals sale bringing in nearly $1.1 million in total.

entry.title: Business or Pleasure: Nvidia's CEO Visits China For the First Time in Years
entry.summary: Jensen Huang hadn’t been to China in four years, but visited Taiwan for the fourth time in one year.

entry.title: Kaspersky Warns of Mac Exploit Targeting Bitcoin and Exodus Wallets
entry.summary: The cybersecurity firm says hackers show "unusual creativity" in building the macOS malware, affecting both Intel and Apple Silicon devices.

entry.title: Air Ball: NBA Star Dwight Howard's Avalanche NFTs Are a Huge Miss
entry.summary: Negative buzz around Dwight Howard's collection, Ballers, was so bad that Ava Labs distanced itself from the collection on Sunday.

entry.summary: The likely reason? The ability to sell Grayscale’s Bitcoin Trust (GBTC) tokens.

entry.title: Someone Airdropped 21K Ordinals to Bitcoin Users as Part of Mysterious Game
entry.summary: The buzzy but anonymous ‘Runecoin’ airdrop is unrelated to Ordinals’ Runes, raising scam concerns.

entry.summary: Market watchers point to the flood of cash exiting Grayscale's Bitcoin ETF.

entry.title: Dogecoin Pumps Amid Speculation Over Twitter Payments
entry.summary: Twitter hasn't confirmed anything about using Dogecoin for payments, but that's not stopping traders from buying the rumor.

entry.title: Bitcoin ETFs Have Gained $4 Billion—But Other Crypto Funds Are Waning
entry.summary: Investors are fast putting money into Bitcoin ETFs—at the expense of other types of crypto funds, a report says.

entry.title: Gaming Tokens Plunge as Bitcoin Nears $40K—But Ronin Is On Fire
entry.summary: Ronin’s RON token nearly hit a two-year high Sunday amid Pixels airdrop hype, but most major gaming tokens are down today.

entry.title: Ethereum DeFi Gets ‘Gasless' Trading With New 0x API
entry.summary: The newest addition to 0x’s selection of trading APIs allows builders to use "gasless" swaps in their decentralized applications on Ethereum.

entry.title: What is Proof of Stake? How it Differs From Proof of Work
entry.summary: Proof of stake is a consensus protocol that locks up crypto to secure the network. It's less energy-intensive than Bitcoin's proof of work mechanism.

entry.title: Bitcoin Slips Below $41,000 as Sell-Off Continues
entry.summary: The price of Bitcoin has continued to slide following the approval of multiple spot Bitcoin ETFs earlier in the month.

entry.title: Terraform Labs Files for Chapter 11 Bankrupty in Delaware
entry.summary: The firm said that the bankruptcy filing would enable it "to execute on its business plan while navigating ongoing legal proceedings."

entry.summary: A Colorado couple had their assets frozen by a state judge after making millions on a cryptocurrency they say they created at God’s command.

entry.summary: Lawyers were impressed by Coinbase's oral arguments, and say full dismissal of the SEC's suit is a realistic possibility.

entry.summary: Bitcoin is down bad—but major altcoins like Solana, Avalanche, and Cardano are also experiencing a brutal selloff.

entry.title: 'Look Touch Own': OONA Discusses Her Performance Art Exhibition
entry.summary: Conceptual artist OONA joins moderator Raina Marie to discuss "Look Touch Own," her performance art exhibition featuring her own former breast implants, which have been tokenized. This conversation was recorded at Rug Radio's R Haus event at Art Basel Miami in December 2023.

entry.title: Genius Marketing by Genius Marketers: How Crypto Builders Can Reach the Masses
entry.summary: Rug Radio founder Farokh Sarmad moderates a conversation between 9dcc founder and CEO Gmoney and Serotonin founder and CEO Amanda Cassatt about the challenges and opportunities in Web3 marketing and how they're navigating the ever-evolving space. Recorded at Rug Radio's R Haus event at Art Basel Miami in December 2023.

entry.title: Generative Art Across Mediums: Artists Discuss the Evolving Space
entry.summary: In this panel discussion from Rug Radio's R Haus at Art Basel Miami 2023, Sofia Garcia, Ismail Tazi, Emily Edelman, and Aleksandra Art discuss the expanding generative art space—and why "generative" doesn't necessarily have to mean digital.

entry.title: The AI Coin to Rule Them All with Mike Grantis
entry.summary: Reza is joined by Mike Grantis from Contango Digital to discuss - The AI coin to rule them all - The Solana Ecosystem - What's next for Solana airdrops

entry.title: Conversation With Snowfro: Bringing 'Chromie Squiggle' #8107 to the Physical Space
entry.summary: Art Blocks founder and CEO and "Chromie Squiggle" project creator Erick "snowfro" Calderon spoke with Benny Redbeard Gross at Rug Radio's R Haus event at Art Basel 2023, to discuss how and why "Chromie Squiggle" NFT #8107 was given a special edition print run in collaboration with Avant Arte.

entry.title: Don't Underestimate Mobile Gaming: Qualcomm's Matthew Grossman
entry.summary: Qualcomm product marketing manager Matthew Grossman tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin why mobile esports is exploding in popularity around the world—and dispels some of the misconceptions around mobile gaming.

entry.title: Bitcoin ETF: This Is the 'Calm Before the Storm', Says ETF Analyst
entry.summary: Bloomberg Senior ETF Analyst Eric Balchunas joins Farokh Sarmad, Michael Anderson, and Ovie Faruq on the FOMO Hour to share the latest intel on the looming approval for a spot Bitcoin ETF, what might happen when the very different worlds of TradFi and crypto collide, and his insights on “Genslish,” the unique and strategic language of SEC chair Gary Gensler.

entry.title: Losing 1500 BTC on Mt Gox and the Problem with Women in Web3
entry.summary:
This week our host is joined by Brooke Lacey!
They discuss: - Making and losing generational wealth - Trauma Bond - Women in Web3 - The Problem with WAGMI

entry.title: ESL Faceit Group Exploring Blockchain 'Opportunistically,' Says Exec
entry.summary: Sam Braithwaite—ESL Faceit Group's VP of Game Ecosystems, Mobile, and Snapdragon Pro Series—shares the esports firm's approach to blockchain technology with GG's Kate Irwin.
